name: Best Res. Clothes Washer (EE+DF)
energy_efficiency_source: Determined by custom savings shape information in 'tsv_features'

installed_cost_source.notes: Total installed cost is average of highest performance front-loader and top-loader clothes washers plus the difference between median typical and connected cost in the Guidehouse report for both front-loaders and top-loaders, 237.25 2020$ (converted to 2022$, from April 2020 to April 2022)

source_data.title: Grid-Interactive Efficient Building Technology Cost, Performance, and Lifetime Characteristics
source_data.author: Nubbe et al.

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

product_lifetime_source.notes: Average of low/high 'Average Life (y)' values (reported low and high values are the same for top-loaders and front-loaders)

source_data.title: Updated Buildings Sector Appliance and Equipment Costs and Efficiencies

_description: Clothes washer, upgraded to a high efficiency unit, with DR-responsive operation
